text:
Developer Relationship Team!!! WOW!! You all did an awesome job this Inbound! I really enjoyed all the ability to learn from anyone, connect with HubSpotters and other devs in the community as well! The F1 party was awesome! Thank you so much for push through the red tape and bring dev items to Inbound!

Hereâ€™s to continuing to push even hard for incoming Inbounds for Dev Days @ Inbound! :confetti_ball::tada::confetti_ball:
We'd be nothing without amazing community members like you :heart:
Totally! The events and community meetups were my favorite part of INBOUND. Dev Rel continues to just knock it out of the park.
